document.discussion_title: Aston Villa coach blamed for defeat - and no it's not Eric Black
document.topic_text: Aston Villa coach blamed for defeat - and no it's not Eric Black An Aston Villa coach is being blamed for a defeat - and no it's not Eric Black! In fact it's not even an Aston Villa defeat, it's Walsall's 4-0 reverse at Bradford at the weekend, their heaviest reverse of the season. With the Saddlers battling for promotion from League One, fans have been scratching their heads to find the reason for the out-of-character setback. And one eagle-eyed Walsall supporter, known as JordanWFC on Twitter, might just have got to the bottom of it. @wfcjordwfc This is an aerial snap taken of the Saddlers team-coach outside Bradford's Valley Parade ground on Saturday... read more
